attributes.action: spend as much per head of population on sea and flood defences as the Netherlands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has accused "global warming" of causing the recent coastal erosion and flooding however the Netherlands spends far more per head of population on sea and flood protection. 

We call on this government to spend as much per head of population as the Netherlands to defend this "Precious stone set in the silver sea".
